mapper.insert: insert into member_table(memberEmail, memberPassword, memberNickName, memberRealName, memberMBTI, memberCoupleCode) values (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberNickName}, #{memberRealName}, #{memberMBTI}, #{memberCoupleCode})
mapper.select: select * from member_table where memberEmail=#{memberEmail} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
mapper.update: update member_table set memberNickName=#{memberNickName}, memberMBTI=#{memberMBTI} where id=#{id}
